OOC: I know soulstice. I didn't notice untill later though.

::Hot Rod/Cleder/Rixer/Forrior/Blyer/Firearm::

He heard the sound of a missile, and looked up. He was the bombarded
with laser shots.
"Scatter!" He jumped out of the way as the missile hit.
He then shot two missiles at Unitron, and four laser shots at Shockwave.
He then opened a comm.
"Cleder, those NDE bots are attacking me!"

Cleder got the message and opened a comm to Iron Raptor.
"New development, Commander. Shockwave and Unitron of the NDE are
attacking Hot Rod. We are going to go help."
He then opened a comm to the Radicons inside Trainwreck.
"The NDE is attacking Hot Rod. Will you help? This goes for you Chosen
Mafia guys too. I know you dont like the NDE."

Cleder, Rixer, Forrior, Blyer, and Firearm turn around and head back
towards Hot Rod, and the Chiviton base.
